mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ad (ad_id, position_id, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, ad_code) values (#{adId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{positionId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{adCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_ad set position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, media_type = #{mediaType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ad_name = #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_link = #{adLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_email = #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_phone = #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_count = #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ad_code = #{adCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select ad_id, position_id, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, ad_code from ecs_ad where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
